name: Hearty Caesar Salad
author: Sheri Y.
summary: This Caesar salad does not mess around. It has everything in great amounts to make it an extremely flavorful and sustaining side dish (or meal in itself). Can add cooked chicken breast if desired to make it more of a meal-in-one.
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, coarsely chopped, or more to taste
directions: Blend mayonnaise, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, egg, black pepper, and seasoned salt in a blender until smooth
Place the bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain the bacon slices on paper towels and crumble
Mix romaine lettuce, bacon, onion, mushrooms, and croutons in a large bowl
Pour dressing over salad; toss to coat
